column3: Shouldn't 1) this be part of `getrawtransaction` primarily, and 2) for `gettransaction` treat it as if it isn't in the wallet at all?
@luke-jr oops you're right, wrong RPC. Fixed.
I like that this keeps the error code the same (RPC_INVALID_ADDRESS_OR_KEY) just changes the message to be clearer to users, but from an API point of view there is no change.\n\nutACK 8a758dc

utACK

I think it should be something like:
```py
block = self.nodes[0].getblock(self.nodes[0].getblockhash(0))
assert_raises_rpc_error(-5, "The genesis block coinbase is not considered an ordinary transaction", self.nodes[0].getrawtransaction, block['merkleroot'])
```
